content.detailedDescription: I watched three glowing red objects gliding below low cloud cover. the first one, which i got a good pic of, was very close, id say less 200 feet, maybe less. there is low cloud cover tonight, they came in low, and from the north. the next two objects were a little higher up, it is one of those that is in the video, now, the video is in hd......What it needs is still frame zoom analysis.......In the still image i have sent, you can clearly see the shape of the object. they are not actually spheres, that's just how they look...........
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Three red glowing objects one after the other in 10 min. span

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend, her two daughters ages 18 and 7 and myself, had just gotten back i'm the road after pulling over momentarily to shelter ourselves during a very violent thunderstorm. we were then driving south on i85 south and entering i285 east. when i happen to glance to my left, right above the treeline, i noticed an extremely brilliant light. at first i thought that it was a spotlight of some sort, either from a plane or a helicopter. but then i realized that i was unable to see any sort of craft associated with this light. not to mention that the light was very stable, almost as if it were affixed to a pole or something. so i pointed out the window and told everyone to look! at that time everyone just looked and remained silent for about 5 seconds. then my girlfriend said maybe it's an airplane or a stadium light, i then replied if so where is the airplane and since when do they have stadium lights that are posted 3,000 feet in the air?  as we pondered additional reasons for this phenomenon, we then found the treeline extending high enough to temporarily block our view of the light for maybe 2-4 seconds. after passing that brief portion of extended treeline, the light was no longer there, we looked in every direction possible from our vantage point. it was simply gone. the next thing i did notice however was some sort of small airplane which appeared to be making very abrupt and exaggerated maneuvers, i do not know if this is because of the light or due to the weather, but i can't help but think that perhaps the two incidences are related.
content.summary: It looked like a star in the middle of a storm cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking east toward the mountains during dusk at about 8:05pm and saw a bright, semi-teardrop shaped object/orb. the bottom part of it looked a little brighter than the top portion. at first i thought it was a small trail coming off of an airplane but a few seconds later, i noticed that it was still there. it was pretty high up, just below the clouds and looked much bigger and brighter than a star. it was glowing brighter than a star and certainly stood out. it stayed there for around 15 minutes, then slowly started to descend behind the mountains out of view.
content.summary: Teardrop shaped orb hovered for a while then descended into distance

content.detailedDescription: I woke up and realized there was someone in my room with me (i was 16 years old) i turned to see two beings standing next to my bed i tried to cry out but i couldnt talk or move the next thing i remember im standing in my back yard and i see a bright light behind the house i dont remember much after that i remembered this event the next morning i dont remember any of the events that happened after i woke and saw the beings or befor seeing the light in the yard but when i awoke the next morning my wrist watch was 4 hours behind the wall clock in the living room this is the only time that this has ever happened to me that i know of but i have dreams sometimes of a room with no walls yet it is brightly lit that i can not explain and sometimes i wake up and i feel weird like i have not bene in my room but have bene somewhere else but i cant tell where
content.summary: I woke up and saw the huminoids next to my bed than i was standing in the yard looking at a bright light

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting on our patio (june 1, 2013 at 10:20 p.M.) when bright orange orbs of light arose over the tree line in the west, they were perfectly round.  they moved steadily, in a loose formation, traveling from north to south, first there were 4 or 5 - then they just disappeared and more appeared; then they, too, disappeared.  in all, my husband counted around 30 of them.  i tried to take photos with my phone camera, but it didn't work. i ran in the house and got another camera, but by then there was only one orb left and it disappeared as i tried to focus. the event took place in around 4 minutes.   we live in mohave valley, ariz. in a tri-state area. they appeared to be following the colorado river (which is 2 blocks west of us) and were possibly above the desert in clark county, nevada or needles, calif.

i don't know what they were, but there was no sound, just the lights moving across the sky.
content.summary: Saw orange orbs in western sky moving in loose formation

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof of an upper manhattan building with friends at about 2 am on a summer evening sitting down and facing west. at one point a friend and i both looked up and saw a bright white light moving overhead towards new jersey. it slowed down a bit halfway over the horizon and abruptly shifted towards the right. it shifted again toward new jersey and sped off at incredible speed over the horizon. i have never seen anything move that fast. it was obviously very high in the sky, emitting its own light. it could not have been a conventional aircraft, as it shifted and moved west faster than should be possible.
content.summary: Light seen overhead, moving very fast

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dogs out in the yard during the 2nd intermission of the pens game 1 when i notice a light slowly moving over my tree line than a 2nd light they are flying in formation than a third watching it move slowly i realize this thing was huge and this was a ufo,i ran upstairs to get my camcorder and got a few seconds of this very large ufo,it seem to disappear behind clouds and for a second i saws a what seem to be smaller light fly near but very fast
content.summary: Letting my dogs out in the yard during the 2nd intermission  the pens is when i saw it and holy crap thats a ufo ran to get my camcorder

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling along the a345 from salisbury and was approaching amesbury.  i noticed 6 (8 in total) very bright lights in the sky at my 10 o'clock position.  as it was only approx. 8:15pm the light had only just started to fade as it's may.

4 of the lights were in an approximate horizontal formation rising slightly from left to right.  the 5th light was below the 4th and the 6th light was to the right between lights 4 & 5 creating a triangle.

the brightness was quite intense and seemed much brighter that aircraft landing lights.

over the space of about 30 seconds the lights went out in sequence from 1 to 4.  then after a short gap light 6 went out.  when the lights went out there was nothing visible, i was expecting to see an aircraft but there was nothing.

at this point i assumed maybe it was flares as boscombe down was a few miles away to my right.

light 5 stayed lit when lights 7 & 8 appeared in sequence to the right of light 5.  these only remained for about 5 seconds and disappeared again 8 then 7.

this left light 5 on its own again.  i was finally able to stop in a bus stop (i'm driving a lorry).  by the time i'd run over to a gate (there was foliage blocking my view) light 5 had finally disappeared.

if i'd have thought about it i would have tried and video the event on my phone whilst driving although a bit risky.  as i was driving a lorry i had a higher vantage point compare to the cars and had a fairly continuous view of the lights with the exception of a few trees.
content.summary: Lights in formation disappearing the reappearing

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i set out nightly make a little bon fire and relax before we go to bed.5 days ago above a tree in our neighbors back yard a brilliant light got both of our attentions and it withered away almost as quickly as it began.Last night in a different part of the sky than the sighting prior this same light appeared.Not a meteor (it was stationary and had not trail)this dull white solid circle appeared and then became as bright as the moon in the night sky if not brighter then slowly shrunk back to the dull circle and then disappeared.Pretty amazing.We live by the airport and this was no plane landing lights.It was not a star shielded by clouds because it was a clear night.I dont know what it was but i can tell you for certain it was not a plane or a meteor.This is our 2nd sighting of this light in the past week.It lasted about a minute.
content.summary: 2nd time we've seen it.Starts out as a dull circle and then grows into a star like brilliance and then back to a dull circle then disappears while never moving.

content.detailedDescription: Una esfera brillante en el horizonte
content.summary: Esfera

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dog into the backyard for his regular afternoon bathroom break. we walk two miles before lunch, and backyard at 1530. i live under a commercial approach path into john wayne airport with my fianc���e, and i often watch the planes fly overhead. it's reminiscent of my time spent in the military. as one such craft passed by i noticed a metallic flash at an altitude at least 500ft above the commercial craft. after a moment's observation i realized the object had no trajectory. i sprinted back to my bedroom closet looking for my pentax 24ucf binoculars. using the compass on my iphone, set to true north, i noted the object at 3 degrees north. i also took note that it hovered above the eastern-most edge of columbus park. through the binoculars i could clearly make out the distinct shape of a "soda can" cylinder. the shape appeared to be made of two different materials; one half was a highly reflective, metallic surface, and the other half a dull grey material (there were markings here i could not make out). i felt exhilarated and had to share. i yelled for my fianc���e to come and see the object, and she confirmed it with the naked eye.

ten minutes passed as the binoculars went back and forth and then two black "balls" appeared at the object's base. it seemed to sprout a tail that corkscrewed with the object's rotation. when the tail finished growing, the balls disappeared. another commercial plane passed between us and the object, blocking my view with the binoculars. instead of being angry, i was jumping up and down at the reference for distance it gave me. i curse my luck for not having a working camera because it continued to rotate silently, it's tail spinning like that of a kite. after another 10 minutes the object briefly shimmered a bluish silver, obscuring its outline for the first time, and moving north very slowly. the tail seemed to drop away from the object and vanish before the object itself shimmered once more and became transparent. i say transparent because it was still visible in the binoculars. my fianc���e could no longer see it, but in the binoculars it seemed obscured as if hidden behind a cloud that wasn't there. it continued north until out of sight.
content.summary: Two-faced soda can with a corkscrew tail. hovered over columbus park for +20 minutes. observed through binoculars.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just crossed broadway on the way to the gas station to pick up something when i stepped into the mcdonalds parking lot and saw three pulsating star-like objects appear one at a time and ascend from north-east of sandia crest. this intrigued me and i continued to watch.  their initial ascent appeared not to be from the mountain itself, but rather i would guess that they appeared less than 500ft above the crest at some distance further east.  their initial trajectory reminded me of anti-aircraft artillery tracer fire.  they were ascending from the northeast to the southwest (directly towards the center of town.  what caught my eye was how absolutely brilliant they were - brighter than stars.  it is not unusual to witness bright reflections off aircraft in the area, but aircraft are different.  these were constantly strobing.  i can't imagine any man-made source of white light that bright in daylight.  if it were a reflection, it would have to have been a faceted surface, but then again the objects did not appear to have any mass.

they continued to ascend more slowly as they neared and gathered more distance between them.  at this point, i was still thinking that it was something related to the base, but then i saw the game changer.  they were ascending towards (if extrapolated) what appeared to be a translucent disk hovering several thousand feet above albuquerque - nearly overhead.  my first thought was that it was a weather balloon convinced that the bright lights were something on (an extremely long) tether. a lady was coming out to her car, which by this point, i was standing near. she asked me what i was looking at and i pointed it out to her.  we watched and discussed the objects in increasing disbelief as more and more people began to notice us watching and then witnessed the objects as well.  the entire incident lasted approximately 1/2-hour with the lady watching the latter 20 minutes of it with up to two-dozen other people observing them for varying periods of time.  

the three object continued to ascend and disperse around the sphere - still motionless - until they no longer appeared to pulsate, and did, in fact, resemble stars.  through the continued ascent, it was apparent to myself and the lady that the objects could not be on a tether, since they were now all around the sphere and appeared higher in perspective.  at this moment, we took note of a southwest flight descending to the sunport and agreed how odd it would be for kirtland afb to do something of this nature 1) over albuquerque proper and 2) not over their airspace and 3) still allowing commercial flights in the same vicinity.  

the three object began to become impossible to discern because of their altitude and the sun.  it was then that the sphere (where up until this point still looked like an oval) started to move north.  it then made a 90-degree turn east towards the mountains staying at a steady altitude, however the perspective this afforded us gave us the perception that the oval was actually an oblong sphere.  whenever the object changed direction, its orientation did not change.  we also could agree, judging by the mountains, that it was a couple thousand feet higher than the mountains.  it then moved north again.  while moving north, it did vary its speed both accelerating and decelerating sharply at speeds not inconsistent with commercial aircraft, but performing maneuvers more similar to helicopters (absolutely, this was not a helicopter).  it even appeared to do a tight horizontal corkscrew (like a whirlpool) before heading west while begining to ascend eventually disappearing (becoming so small, we could no longer see it).

it was tan to translucent and shiny.  the whole time we thought how odd everything was.  i can't believe no one thought to take a picture.  we left thinking that we would see it on the evening news because we were all pretty sure whatever it was would have afforded northeast albuquerque quite the show.  i even called a station to ask them to investigate.  they said the sunport and kirtland afb didn't report anything and that basically i was nuts.  but two dozen people saw this. i must believe that their were more across town.  agreed, if it was kirtland, they wouldn't own up to it if it were their's (or something else), but we were certain others would have witnessed this enough to cause a stir in the news - but nothing?

i know what i saw.  i know others saw what i saw.  i just don't know what they were.  true definition i suppose - unidentified - flying - objects.  not saying they were from space, just that there was nothing out of nasa's fort sumner balloon experiments (even though they moved unlike and balloon i have ever seen) and pretty uncharacteristic of anything kirtland does.

hoping others that witnessed it have theories or different perspectives to develop a better picture (or maybe an actual picture?)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three pulsating star-like objects in mid-day and a larger translucent oblong sphere

content.detailedDescription:
Star gazing throughout the night on the patio on a clear night. about 2:45 am, i noticed two bright starlike flashes within 15 seconds of each other. my view of flashes were obstructed by a tree but it did get my attention.
about one minute later i witnessed an unobstructed view of a stationary, white, starlike flash about 80 degrees up from my point. flash was extremely bright, like a type of energy release. the flash of light almost instantaneously turned into a perfectly circular red object. it almost seem to have an outline to it. the object proceeded to move from the stationary spot and travel to the right and what seemed to be an ascension into the atmosphere at a very high speed. 
from flash to out of view, the event was about 5 seconds. very fluid and oddly beautiful.
content.summary: Stationary bright starlike flash, object then ascended right

content.detailedDescription: I was at a gas station with my wife to pick up something when i was just about to enter the vehicle and noticed a very white rectangular shaped object moving very slowly across the sky towards my wife and i with no sound or contrail left behind.  before i could remind myself to take a picture of it, it was already to the northwest side of where i had originally witnessed it and it was further away.  i managed to take a picture just before i lost site of it.
content.summary: While stopped at a gas station, i noticed a white rectangular shaped object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home coming into buffalo on co35 looking at a flickerin white star then it became 2star size of a aspirin northwest looking at them blowing up flickeringbig 5, 6 seconds went back to normal star size  floated north moves like a satellite if you ever seen one they disappears cause it gets really small as they travel that's what these do. 23rd was a thursday night almost midnight i experienced the same thing but i was at home got home from work i was on the deck there was four of them 1 street west blowing up all big like an aspirin may be bigger all big for 5 seconds got small star move north faded 5 ,10 seconds later same thing but right above me like right by the big dipper blown up big in white for 5,6 seconds shriveled to the normal star size move towards the north moving faded disappeared 10-15 seconds later another one towards the south west blowing up all aspirin sizebig and white5,6 sec went to normal star size and faded away 10-15 seconds later correctly west were the first one i saw,normal star size blown up big white kind of flickering 5, 6 sec then went back to regular star size move slowly faded what i thought at first was a helicopter but obviously it was not no sound was a full moon that night but on the 31st fri night it was dark and storm comingsouthwest what are those i see more what are these i was in coon rapids on the 6th10th that's when i seen the first ones its always more than one .. only one person i know seen them hope there's more people coming to crazy.Last couple years it was orange colored orbs last couple weeks i've seening white white ones. and its scary cause i feel like i'm being watched and i look up and then i experience this.
something going on up there.
content.summary: Bright white lights start out size of a star .

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room watching the daily show with jon stewart.  it was a wednesday night on oct 2nd 2008 at around 11pm.  my wife was lying next to me on the sofa sleeping.  the next thing i remember was waking up to myself breathing in and out very deeply and trying to force my eyes open.  as i did so, i noticed the light i had on in the kitchen was off and the light in the dining room was on.  as i was trying to force my eyes open i noticed two beings standing directly in front of me, but i was too paralyzed to look at their faces.  i could only see the tops of their heads.  from the height of my tv on its stand, i could tell they stood exactly 4ft tall.  i wear glasses, but in this state, i could see perfectly clear.  i could see light emitting from the top of their heads in a wavy kind of way and to the right.  the beings were snow white in color and their heads appeared very shiny.  i was very afraid beyond any fear i have ever felt before in my life.  as soon as i blinked, everything was back to normal.  the tv was still on, but the show was over.  i immediately woke my wife up and told her about what i had experienced.  she is a very light sleeper and for her to not wake up from the noise i was making surprised me.  i heard two aircraft moving at an extremely rapid speed just above our house fast enough to make the house rattle from its proximity at around 2am.  since that day and still today, i've noticed a small hole on the tip of my right thumb that will heal and return.  sometimes it would bleed in the mornings and it has yet to go away.
content.summary: Paralyzed while watching tv in living room

content.detailedDescription: Had taken dog outside to go do his business, (11:20pm)i waited on back stoop and looked into the sky, noticed a very bright light in one spot. i watched it wondering if it was a star, then it started to glow brighter, i took my cellphone out and tried to take a picture then it headed w-sw as if it was headed back into the stars. i then started to tap on my back door window trying to get my girlfriends attention to come up and witness this, but she didnt hear me hitting the glass, then the light deminished into nothing and disappeard as if it had headed deep into space (my assumption by its appearance of direction). i waited to see if i could see any faint movement in the sky of its light which i thought i had and it was gone. thats it! i added a photo, the thing is towards the middle of the picture, you might have to look kinda hard, but i dont see any other stars in the pic, this was the brightest and was lucky to get this.
content.summary: Seen bright light hover, then slowly headed w-sw into the stars and then slowly lost brightness until nothing was there.

content.detailedDescription:
Husband and i were out on back porch when noticed under the cloud cover a bright fireball like object was rising in the se then its direction switched from ascending to straight line towards the n.  we kept discussing what it looked like when we noticed it hesitated in the flight path almost like a pausing then continued on straight path.  no sound.  then it just disapeared ...Possibly cloud cover could have obstructed our view. we watched it for at least 1 1/2 minutes.
we both were amazed by it since we seen it rise/ascend then abruptly change direction to a straight line.  if it wasnt for the pausing during its flight path i dont think we would be reporting this as unusual.  my husband is ex-military and said no way it was a flare or plane or even a star.
content.summary: Fireball like object rising in the distance changed direction abruptly

content.detailedDescription: I was living in tulsa ok, and i was about 12 yrs old at the time.  i was living in an apartment complex and was riding my bicycle to the office where i would normally check the mail.  for some reason i could not understand, i had a feeling to look almost directly above my head to the sky.  there were trees around me, but i could see the object very clearly.  i cannot remember the exact time frame, but i know it was either spring or summer when i witnessed this.  i could not comprehend what i was looking at.  nothing could make any sense in my mind as to what the object was or could be.  it was a perfect sphere shaped object that sat without any motion whatsoever in the sky and it was reflective as if a mirror could be made into a sphere.  the sculpture in chicago of the bean shaped reflective surface would best describe it's appearance.  i didn't feel anything other that i kept telling myself that i need to watch this and not move.  for some reason, as i was sitting on my bike, i had moved forward and as i did, a tree branch blocked my view of the object, and it had disappeared from my view.  at the time my younger brother was with me and i told him to look up because he would see a ufo.  i'm not sure what made me say this, but i told him that.  he witnessed the object move at the same time the tree branch had blocked my view.  he told me that it shot to the right at a speed immeasurable to the human eye.
content.summary: Silver spherical object hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture of pretty clouds to the west of me.  i was in the car, window down.  snapped with my iphone quickly before traffic obscured my view. looked at photo and cannot explain object.  no bugs or birds in the area. object was not seen with naked eye.
content.summary: Object appeared in picture of clouds

content.detailedDescription: My wife was having a smoke outside on our porch around 10:10 pm on 6-1-13 saint clair pa . she saw two large bright red- orange -white objects coming over the berma she was facing east and both objects were moving in a north western direction. she called me out and i seen them both. one looked like it was higher up then the other one .Then they both stopped at the same time and just stayed there for about one and a half minutes. then the one that was higher than the other one either the lights dimmed real fast and went out or shot away very fast in a north direction . a few seconds later and the other one did the same thing.Also about two months ago we both saw a similar single large object at night  this time a pure red in color. that one was going in a south western direction from our back porch. none of these objects have any kind of a sound coming from them. we also have a large triangular  aircraft that flies around at night in this area also i personally have seen it twice . its a large craft and sounds just like jet engines. it has a light in each corner and one in the middle of it. just so everyone reading this knows that we have alot of military aircraft flying in this area all the time so i have no clue as to what is going on. i just know that alot of strange things are flying in our sky day and night.We both feel that it is time that something is said about all of this activity that we witness. and just for the record, my wife would always come in from having her cigarette on our porch and tell me about all of these strange things she would see in the sky and i would say something like -yeah sure your watching to many of those ufo shows on tv and laugh. well i'm not laughing anymore.
content.summary: Wife and i seen two large bright red- orange -white  objects moving together in night sky

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside looking north and saw 6 or 7 bright orange objects moving towards east. they moved slow and steady in a straight line. it gave me a cold shiver when i saw it. 4 people besides me saw them. they flew into cloud cover and we lost sight.
content.summary: 6 or 7 bright orange orbs movong east

content.detailedDescription:
Triangular in shape, 3 yellow-orange lights, all were stationary.. got a picture.....The lights then went off. did not see any shape to object just the triangular shape in the lights. have never seen anything like it before in my 63 years.



i was trying to relax away from the computer....Looking at television, and looked out my 6th floor window.  not much of a narrative .


thank you.... i did get a good digital photo
content.summary: I saw 3 yellow-orange lights come on in the shape of a long triangle..Have picture of what i saw

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend  and i returned home after going out for a meal. it was dusk, sun setting behind us from our back porch. we heard back fire from a single engine plane flying very low over the tree tops in high density populated area; our house.
while watching the plane less than a block away to the north, we notice a black object obscuring  our view to the south.
we walked off our porch up to the object within an arm length. too nervous o do more.
please call me so i can  tell you all.
content.summary: I was within five feet of the object that appeared suddenly leaving at indescribable sped. no sound, observed me and girlfriend for sometime. quite uncomfortable. i want you to hear my story. no doubt they exist or time  warp but real.

content.detailedDescription:
On or about may 26.
the somewhat smooth cloud ceiling was at approximately 3000 feet.  there were patches of clear sky as well. two days prior i had heard the chatter of returning flocks of cranes and it was happening again, so i stopped my yard work and took the time to watch them enjoy the thermal lift provided by rising heat from spruce grove.  i have been doing this for several years. the birds have a distinctive sound that is easily recognizable. later, i looked up the height at which the birds fly. it���s approximately 2400 feet, so i am assuming that is at or near the altitude of the flock.  my view of them was framed by the second story edge of my home to the east and a tree in my neighbor���s yard to the west.  i stepped back into the shadow of my home to get a better view of the birds as watched.  as i watched, above the birds, who were not disturbed, there came a circular cloud from the west. it was large and moving south by south west at, my guess, forty to sixty miles per hour . if you have ever watched a blunt nosed ferry ship plow its way through the ocean then you can imagine how this thing was moving through the sky. it seemed to be producing the fog/cloud around itself in an apparent but poor attempt to disguise itself.  at about halfway across my field of view it changed direction to south. there was no curve to the turn, nor did the cloud/craft bank for the adjustment.  it seemed to be emitting a shimmering cloudiness around itself, but nevertheless it was blatantly obvious is was controlled and was not a cloud. every now and then a glimpse of something light grey could be seen.  after a few seconds it tilted upward about twenty degrees and began to climb. it was at this point that i ran into the house to find my camera and take a picture. when i returned, it was gone.  as for its size, i can best describe it as being about the size of the bottom of a standard coffee mug held at arm���s length over my head.  needless to say i am spending a lot of my time looking up.

ex rcaf
content.summary: Shimmering self produced cloud camoflage

content.detailedDescription:
Como hace varios meses sigo fotografiando en la zona y siguen apareciendo objetos en el cielo de 
distintas formas 
aclaro y vuelvo a contar que solo la camara lo capta no son visibles al ojo humano .
al menos para mi ..Por ahora..No se ..
content.summary: No son visibles al ojo humano yo  no los veo los capto la camara digital

content.detailedDescription:
This incident occurred roughly 13 years ago. as much as i've obsessed over this event, it's odd that i don't have a record of this that states the exact date and time. i may have had something a few years ago, but if the information was in that notebook it's long gone now. 

in appx. 1999, unsure of month, on appx. 10:30-11:30 pm cst, i was standing outside in my mother's front yard on keith road in lumberton, texas. 

she and i had just returned from a later than usual night of delivering repaired jewelry to various clients, she owned a small jewelry repair store in beaumont, texas at the time.

(i'd like to note that while i believe we had just returned, i'm not 100 percent on that. it's possible that that may have been a different night.)

i must have retrieved the wireless phone from inside the house and then went outside to talk to my friend james on the phone. at that time, we were both very interested in the idea of aliens and really just about anything paranormal. i was observing a satellite in the night sky, n-nw of the direction i was facing.

three houses sat, and still sit, across the street in a small, private drive owned by the family members that reside there. that drive is perpendicular to keith road and almost directly across the street from, what was then, my mother's driveway.

the tree line behind these homes consists of mostly tall pine trees, roughly 60-70 feet in height. pretty dense too - nothing can be observed through the trees (homes, et cetera). following the tree line, the trees in the back sort of curve around and behind the leftmost home and back to the street - so from my perspective on the ground, i have a larger view of the sky toward the center of this clearing made by the home construction and less of a view toward the left and right, as those tress were closer to me (left). trees toward the right followed the road back, but further view this direction was also obscured by trees on other lots further down. 

ironically, we were talking about ufos and aliens when the sighting occurred.

not too long after james and i were on the phone a large craft became visible from behind the left of the tree line across the street.

whatever it was, it was moving extremely slow, i'm guessing appx. 5 miles per hour.  

it was a black triangle. yes, i know how cliche this is, but it is what it is however, here's something that isn't cliche (at least i don;t believe it is). the triangle was moving backward. backward! 

at the time i wasn't, but i'm now an electrical engineer. i graduated top of my class from one of the best engineering departments in the country. i've worked with nasa. i've been weightless aboard a modified c9-b aircraft. i almost went to work for lockheed martin as a ballistic missiles systems engineer. the point i'm trying to make is that i now understand principles required for flight. i understand the dynamics involved and i know, without a fraction of a doubt, what i saw that night. here's the thing - it wasn't an airplane. it wasn't a balloon. it wasn't anything that i've ever seen... and i've looked, extensively. it also wasn't conforming to any conventional methods of flight. period. this thing used something else entirely. nothing that big can move that slow without utilizing a different technology altogether.   

the craft continued on an eastern-ly path. its course never shifted, nor did its speed. i was able to examine the craft for at least 3-8 mins. closely too! 

the craft had two red lights and one white, systematically-blinking light.

each light was in one corner of the ufo. the white light was at the back, or what i'm going to refer to as the top of the ufo. 

the "tail" light blinked about every second or so - when it did blink, i could make out ridges, or lines running perpendicular to the "base" of the craft, well almost to the "base," it was very large, so that light didn't illuminate the entire side of the craft... about 1/2-3/4 of it i'd say. 

there weren't any other noticeable features. it wasn't shiny, as i recall the ridges' texture resembled something like that of a spray-in bed liner for pickup trucks. 

immediately after seeing this thing in the sky, i made a comment to my friend on the phone and then, i'm guessing, let him go because of the excitement.

i, hesitantly, ran into the house to try and grab a camera. there happened to one near the door, but the film was completely used so i had nothing to visually document the ufo.

my mother was asleep on the couch, and didn't wake up in time to witness the event.

i ran back outside and observed the craft continue to move toward the east and then disappear behind the tree line.

not at any point did someone drive down the road. i've never seen anyone report this sighting and it's really boggling that no one did as a major highway runs to the west of that position. 

i'd love it if someone could let me know if there have been similar sightings. this is something that has been of extreme interest to me for some time now, for obvious reasons.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo flying backwards; very close sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  sitting on my deck relaxing
2.  just looking at the mountains enjoying the view when they appeared in the 
3 .  i thought maybe a plane pulling a banner because the object near it was red
4 .  the initial object seemed to be moving at a pretty good pace at first, but then it slowed and stopped.  the red object trailing it continued to move around it but didn't go to far from it at first.  soon i saw two more shiny objects approach from the same direction, stop and hover similarly to the first.  at one point all four objects appeared to be fairly close together.  the initial object and the red object drifted off to the north.  shortly thereafter, the red object appeared next to one of the other shiny objects.  eventually, they also drifted off to the north.
5.  curiosity.  i might be imagining this, but the birds in the area seemed to be acting strangely at the time the objects were in view
6. drifted out of my view
content.summary: 4 objects approached from the east.  first saw one shiny and one red that appeared to be traveling together.  shortly two other shiny ones appeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Over the past few weeks i havebeen studying and practicing the ce-5 techniquesdevribled by dr. steven greer. i have had very interesting results, but this week i am in rural ga where there is no light pollution or very much air traffic, and during my contact effirts i had several fly-ovets by star-like objects. 
first, the objects appeared and crossed part of the sky only to fade away, onceappearing to possibly move at a path away from the surface of the earth.  
later, there were four fly-overs by other star-like objects, silent, and then the aircraft started to show up.  the planes flew as if to intercept the objects, on intercept courses, but they never caug
at 5am, a plane made a very low flyover of my location. it was at the time i felt as thpugh there was something in the pasture behind my lication.  and iheard tones and a pulsing sound, almost like the sound you hear near a transformer. i then had a feeling like there was acraft inthe pasture but "they" felt it unsafe and unwise to "fully materialise."
...Whatever that means...
there are four dogs here at this property where i am staying, and i feel its worth mentioning they becane very excited when it "felt" like something was in the pasture.  
this experience validated the realities of some of what ive read from cseti and i believe that further attempts will be benefitted by the use of some equipment to get objective data - suchas a camera with passive night vision and other recording devices for data collection.
the presence of the aircraft makes me nervous though, as while the entire experience could have been cooincidence, it also could imply that there were others aware of my attempts at contact and of the et response.
that worries me.
content.summary: Several alleged satellites with airplanes in pursuit

content.detailedDescription: My name is daina chaviano (mufon field investigator). i am filling in this report on behalf the witnesses that i interviewed, as requested by morgan beall. this was a sighting made by two adult persons (male and female). he went out to the front garden to smoke, and saw 6 stationary objects on the se. the objects began moving forward one by one, leaving a perfect distance between them. they crossed over the sky almost over him and they eventually disappeared one by one. even though their lights went off, they could still see the dark shape of the object as they keep on moving forward, never changing direction, until they vanished behind the trees and buildings in the area. the witnesses claimed the shape of the objects were clearer through his binoculars than through his video camera (see video and drawings attached).
content.summary: Several objects over a miami neighborhood
